hints.label: def-case-a
hints.title: Case A - Consistent Fitness Ordering
hints.content:
784: :label: def-case-a
785: 
786: For a matched pair $(i, j)$ where $j = \pi(i)$ from the synchronous coupling {prf:ref}`def-synchronous-cloning-coupling`, we say the pair exhibits **Case A (Consistent Fitness Ordering)** if both swarms have the same lower-fitness walker:
787: 
788: $$
789: V_{\text{fit}, 1, i} \leq V_{\text{fit}, 1, j} \quad \text{AND} \quad V_{\text{fit}, 2, i} \leq V_{\text{fit}, 2, j}
790: $$
hints.raw_directive:
781: ### 3.1. Setup and Case Definition
782: 
783: :::{prf:definition} Case A - Consistent Fitness Ordering
784: :label: def-case-a
785: 
786: For a matched pair $(i, j)$ where $j = \pi(i)$ from the synchronous coupling {prf:ref}`def-synchronous-cloning-coupling`, we say the pair exhibits **Case A (Consistent Fitness Ordering)** if both swarms have the same lower-fitness walker:
787: 
788: $$
789: V_{\text{fit}, 1, i} \leq V_{\text{fit}, 1, j} \quad \text{AND} \quad V_{\text{fit}, 2, i} \leq V_{\text{fit}, 2, j}
790: $$
791:

hints.label: lem-case-a-bounded-expansion
hints.title: Case A Bounded Expansion
hints.content:
941: :label: lem-case-a-bounded-expansion
942: 
943: For a pair $(i,j)$ in Case A (consistent fitness ordering):
944: 
945: $$
946: \mathbb{E}[\|x'_{1,i} - x'_{2,i}\|^2 + \|x'_{1,j} - x'_{2,j}\|^2 \mid \text{Case A}] \leq (1 + \epsilon_A) (D_{ii} + D_{jj}) + C_A
947: $$
948: 
949: where $\epsilon_A = O(1/L)$ is small for separated swarms, and $C_A = 2d\delta^2$.
hints.raw_directive:
938: This doesn't give contraction. The issue is that Case A alone may not contract - it's the **combination** with Case B that provides overall contraction.
939: 
940: :::{prf:lemma} Case A Bounded Expansion
941: :label: lem-case-a-bounded-expansion
942: 
943: For a pair $(i,j)$ in Case A (consistent fitness ordering):
944: 
945: $$
946: \mathbb{E}[\|x'_{1,i} - x'_{2,i}\|^2 + \|x'_{1,j} - x'_{2,j}\|^2 \mid \text{Case A}] \leq (1 + \epsilon_A) (D_{ii} + D_{jj}) + C_A
947: $$
948: 
949: where $\epsilon_A = O(1/L)$ is small for separated swarms, and $C_A = 2d\delta^2$.
950:

hints.label: unlabeled-proof-174
hints.content:
953: 
954: :::{prf:proof}
955: Total expected distance:
956: 
957: $$
958: \mathbb{E}[D'_{ii}] + D'_{jj} = \mathbb{E}[D'_{ii}] + D_{jj}
959: $$
960: 
961: Using the bound from Section 3.3 and $D_{ji} \leq (1 + \epsilon)(D_{ii} + D_{jj})$ for small $\epsilon$:
962: 
963: $$
964: \mathbb{E}[D'_{ii}] \leq (1 - p_{\min}) D_{ii} + p_{\min} D_{jj} + \Delta p [(1 + \epsilon)(D_{ii} + D_{jj}) + d\delta^2]
965: $$
966: 
967: Adding $D_{jj}$:
968: 
969: $$
970: \mathbb{E}[D'_{ii} + D'_{jj}] \leq [(1 - p_{\min}) + \Delta p (1 + \epsilon)] D_{ii} + [p_{\min} + 1 + \Delta p(1 + \epsilon)] D_{jj} + \Delta p d\delta^2
971: $$
972: 
973: Since $p_{\min} + \Delta p = p_{\max}$ and $\Delta p \leq 1$:
974: 
975: $$
976: \leq [1 + \epsilon] D_{ii} + [1 + p_{\max} + \epsilon] D_{jj} + d\delta^2 \leq (1 + 2\epsilon) (D_{ii} + D_{jj}) + 2d\delta^2
977: $$
hints.raw_directive:
952: :::
953: 
954: :::{prf:proof}
955: Total expected distance:
956: 
957: $$
958: \mathbb{E}[D'_{ii}] + D'_{jj} = \mathbb{E}[D'_{ii}] + D_{jj}
959: $$
960: 
961: Using the bound from Section 3.3 and $D_{ji} \leq (1 + \epsilon)(D_{ii} + D_{jj})$ for small $\epsilon$:
962: 
963: $$
964: \mathbb{E}[D'_{ii}] \leq (1 - p_{\min}) D_{ii} + p_{\min} D_{jj} + \Delta p [(1 + \epsilon)(D_{ii} + D_{jj}) + d\delta^2]
965: $$
966: 
967: Adding $D_{jj}$:
968: 
969: $$
970: \mathbb{E}[D'_{ii} + D'_{jj}] \leq [(1 - p_{\min}) + \Delta p (1 + \epsilon)] D_{ii} + [p_{\min} + 1 + \Delta p(1 + \epsilon)] D_{jj} + \Delta p d\delta^2
971: $$
972: 
973: Since $p_{\min} + \Delta p = p_{\max}$ and $\Delta p \leq 1$:
974: 
975: $$
976: \leq [1 + \epsilon] D_{ii} + [1 + p_{\max} + \epsilon] D_{jj} + d\delta^2 \leq (1 + 2\epsilon) (D_{ii} + D_{jj}) + 2d\delta^2
977: $$
978:
